reviewText: My daughters love it! Fast shipping.

This DVD contains six episodes from the My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic series, including:

1. Look Before You Sleep
2. Winter Wrap Up
3. Too Many Pinkie Pies
4. Wonderbolts Academy
5. Apple Family Reunion
6. Keep Calm and Flutter On

The problem I have here is that Too Many Pinkies was already released in an earlier movie. I would think they would know what they already released and have chosen a different episode to include on this DVD. Other than that, it's cute and teaches young children the values of friendship and believing in yourself. Great Buy :)
This was requested from a grandchild as a Christmas gift and that child was thrilled beyond reason.  Entertaining to say the least.
This was Granddaughter's request for Easter and she was very happy also received 2 other My Little Pony videos which she requested.

although only one eppisode is to do with the seasons and the rest have nothing to do with each other the eppisodes them selvs are good how every i recomend saveing your money and buying a season 1,2,3,4 dvd boxset when it comes out

Great design, cute characters, good storylines and excellent animation.  My 2nd graders sometimes get to watch movies at lunchtime as a reward.  We watched it this week and they LOVED it!  It was my first time watching it and I quite enjoyed it,too. The story we watched involved Rainbow Dash entering flight school, 'Top Gun' style.  There seem to enough little touches for adults to keep it entertaining.
it is great for kids. As a mother it teaches sharing and frandship. I like as a grown up too.

I have been buying all the MLPFIM DVDs that come out but I won't be anymore and will just be buying the season DVDs. Many of these episodes are already out on the season DVDs and Too many Pinkies was already on the Pinkie Pie Party DVD.  Im tired of rebuying the same episodes over and over again
This Dvd is filled with 6 special stories of each one of The Ponies from the 1st and 2nd and 3rd season. This is one Awesome Dvd that can be a Great par of Everyones Dvd Collection!

This DVD contains six episodes from the My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic series.  Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Look Before You Sleep
2. Winter Wrap Up
3. Too Many Pinkie Pies
4. Wonderbolts Academy
5. Apple Family Reunion
6. Keep Calm and Flutter On
Arrive on time, excellent item, perfect condition, works excellent.
Random fact: The actor that voices Discord is John de Lancie, he also played Q on the best Star Trek series ever.  So there's that.
My daughter loves My Little Pony. She's borderline obsessed. I can't wait to give this to her.
Great product, great price, great service!
